data.text:
When did you last work into the evening or at a weekend? How do you approach the topic with an employee? Evidence shows that many employees are working out of hours, adding increasing pressure and the risk of burnout, and suggest that it may be time to explore "work life fluidity" - the latest term to emerge as organizations look to tackle the issues of work-life balance. An interesting article suggests that if 'fluidity' works, employees could experience great job satisfaction and #productivity. Link to the article https://lnkd.in/ehBA_w74 Interested in how to drive #employability? Download our guide below >> https://lnkd.in/gE6KkMx7

Encouraging a work-life balance among your employees isn't just a nice thing to do; it also reduces burnout and increases job gratification. When employees feel supported in their personal lives, they thrive in the workplace. What strategies do you use to make sure your team maintains a healthy balance? #WorkLife #AgentTips
